attributes.action: The GMC to open more Exam slots in egypt for March 12th 2020  of Plab 1 test.
attributes.background: I created this petition to rally up support for the GMC to add additional seats or open more available venues, so that a large number of medical doctors have the ability to attempt this exam on March 12th, 2020.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government is not responsible for decisions of the GMC.

You could start a petition calling for the Government to fund more doctors, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
